name: Carlitos: Crepusculo
description:
A Programming University Project

*Gamepad Controller Reccomended

Keyboard Controls:

A D to move left and Right 

Spacebar to Jump

Left Click to Attack

Right Click to Bow Attack

Esc to Pause

Gamepad Controlls:

Left Stick To move

X to Jump

Square To Attack

Start/Options to Pause

Credits:

 Title/Name by Alejo Gaitan 

 Code by Julian Lanty  

 Game Design by Ignacio Funes, Alejo Gaitan & Julian Lanty
